description: The Master’s Step Daughter, Vera, has decided to test the Master’s authority. She she’s she is going out on a date and that there is nothing the Master can do to stop her… She’s Wrong… Very wrong. He transforms and trains her into a fembot that will obey his every command. EVERY COMMAND.
title: A NAUGHTY STEP-DAUGHTER MUST BE TRAINED AND TRANSFORMED BY THE MASTER
